mean_en: a word or phrase for one thing that is used to refer to another thing in order to show or suggest that they are similar
word_etyma: meta超过，改变+phor带来→语言改变着说→metaphor隐喻
short_phrase: a metaphor for too much work
sentence: We use a metaphor in this sentence: "She is a walking dictionary”.
sentence_trans: 我们在这个句子里使用了比喻“她是一本活字典”。
